name: mri_robust_template
author: FreeSurfer Developers
description: Constructs an unbiased robust template for longitudinal volumes using an iterative method.

inputs.description: Input movable volumes to be aligned to common mean/median template.
inputs.name: Movable volumes

inputs.description: Output template volume (final mean/median image).
inputs.name: Template file

inputs.description: Set outlier sensitivity manually. Higher values mean less sensitivity.
inputs.name: Outlier sensitivity

inputs.description: Auto-detect good sensitivity (recommended for head or full brain scans).
inputs.name: Auto-detect sensitivity

inputs.description: Output transforms to template (for each input).
inputs.name: Output transforms

inputs.description: Output images: map and resample each input to template.
inputs.name: Resampled images

inputs.description: Output images: header-adjusted movables (no resampling).
inputs.name: Header-adjusted images

inputs.description: Output weights (outliers) in target space.
inputs.name: Outlier weights

inputs.description: Weights (outlier) map will be inverted (0=outlier), as in earlier versions.
inputs.name: Invert outlier weights

inputs.description: Construct template from: 0 Mean, 1 Median (default).
inputs.name: Template average type

inputs.description: Use TP# for spatial init (default random), 0: no init.
inputs.name: Initial TP

inputs.description: Map everything to init TP# (init TP is not resampled).
inputs.name: Fix initial TP

inputs.description: Allow also intensity scaling (default off).
inputs.name: Intensity scaling

inputs.description: Only perform iscale (no transformation, default off).
inputs.name: Intensity scaling only

inputs.description: Use initial intensity scales.
inputs.name: Initial intensity scales

inputs.description: Output final intensity scales (will activate --iscale).
inputs.name: Final intensity scales

inputs.description: Find 3 parameter translation only.
inputs.name: Translation only

inputs.description: Find 12 parameter affine transform.
inputs.name: Affine transform

inputs.description: Use initial transforms (lta) on source ('id'=identity).
inputs.name: Initial transforms

inputs.description: Input masks applied to movables.
inputs.name: Input masks

inputs.description: Output VOX2VOX lta file (default is RAS2RAS).
inputs.name: VOX2VOX output

inputs.description: Use least squares instead of robust M-estimator (for testing only).
inputs.name: Least squares

inputs.description: Do not iterate, just create first template.
inputs.name: No iteration

inputs.description: Iterate max # times (if #tp>2 default 6, else 5 for 2tp reg.).
inputs.name: Max iterations

inputs.description: Iterate max # times on highest resolution (default 5).
inputs.name: High resolution max iterations

inputs.description: Stop iterations when all transform updates fall below the specified value.
inputs.name: Iteration stop threshold

inputs.description: Iterate max # times (default 5) for individual pairwise registrations.
inputs.name: Pairwise max iterations

inputs.description: Stop individual pairwise registration iterations when transform updates fall below the specified value.
inputs.name: Pairwise iteration stop threshold

inputs.description: Subsample if dimension > specified value on all axes (default no subsampling).
inputs.name: Subsample threshold

inputs.description: Do not use multi-resolution (only highest resolution).
inputs.name: Disable multi-resolution

inputs.description: Convert images to float internally (default: keep input type).
inputs.name: Convert to float

inputs.description: Use nearest neighbor in final interpolation when creating average.
inputs.name: Nearest neighbor interpolation

inputs.description: Use double precision instead of float internally (large memory usage).
inputs.name: Double precision

inputs.description: Center template at average CRAS, instead of average barycenter.
inputs.name: Center at CRAS

inputs.description: Volume resolution threshold (default is 0.01 mm).
inputs.name: Resolution threshold

inputs.description: Matrix frobenius norm threshold (default is 0.0001).
inputs.name: Frobenius norm threshold

inputs.description: Show debug output (default no debug output).
inputs.name: Debug mode
